title: Does FP16 still work?
body:
Hi, 

I am trying to train with `FP16` mode. Following is the error I got:
```
  File "/opt/conda/bin/catalyst-dl", line 10, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/catalyst/dl/__main__.py", line 33, in main
    COMMANDS[args.command].main(args, uargs)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/catalyst/dl/scripts/run.py", line 79, in main
    check=args.check
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/catalyst/dl/experiments/runner.py", line 196, in run_experiment
    self._run_stage(stage)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/catalyst/dl/experiments/runner.py", line 175, in _run_stage
    self._run_epoch(loaders)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/catalyst/dl/experiments/runner.py", line 160, in _run_epoch
    self._run_loader(loaders[loader_name])
  File "/raid/bac/kaggle/imet2019/imet/src/runner.py", line 72, in _run_loader
    self._run_event("batch_end")
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/catalyst/dl/experiments/runner.py", line 94, in _run_event
    getattr(callback, f"on_{event}")(self.state)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/catalyst/dl/callbacks/base.py", line 348, in on_batch_end
    loss = self._compute_loss(state, criterion) * self.multiplier
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/catalyst/dl/callbacks/base.py", line 336, in _compute_loss
    state.input[self.input_key]
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 493, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/loss.py", line 617, in forward
    reduction=self.reduction)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 2163, in binary_cross_entropy_with_logits
    return torch.binary_cross_entropy_with_logits(input, target, weight, pos_weight, reduction_enum)
RuntimeError: expected backend CUDA and dtype Float but got backend CUDA and dtype Half

```

My environments:
- GPU V100 
- Catalyst 19.5 

Does it still work?
